00029 class EngineObserver
00030 {
00031 public:
00032     EngineObserver();
00033     virtual ~EngineObserver();
00034     virtual void engineStateChanged( EngineBase::EngineState /*state*/ ) {}
00035     virtual void engineNewMetaData( const MetaBundle &/*bundle*/, bool /*trackChanged*/ ) {}
00036     virtual void engineVolumeChanged( int /*percent*/ ) {}
00037     virtual void engineTrackPositionChanged( long /*position*/ ) {}
00038 };

00040 #include <qptrlist.h>
00045 class EngineSubject

00049     void detach( EngineObserver *observer );
00050

00052     EngineSubject();

00055     void newMetaDataNotify( const MetaBundle &/*bundle*/, bool /*trackChanged*/ );
00056     void volumeChangedNotify( int /*percent*/ );
00057     void trackPositionChangedNotify( long /*position*/ );
00058
